page.home.banner.paragraph: Media Firewall is a powerful AI-based content moderation tool that helps online communities keep their platforms safe and free from harmful content.
page.home.moderation.mainTitle: Say goodbye to expensive traditional manual moderation
page.home.moderation.listItem.Time-consu: Time-consuming: It requires significant time and effort.
page.home.moderation.listItem.Inconsiste: Inconsistent: Moderation decisions can vary between moderators.
page.home.moderation.listItem.Limited Sc: Limited Scale: Manual moderation becomes difficult at scale.
page.home.moderation.listItem.Costly: Costly: It requires dedicated moderators, adding costs.
page.home.moderation.listItem.Human Erro: Human Error: Moderators are susceptible to making mistakes.
page.home.featureBlog.mainTitle: Personalized features to match your requirements
page.home.offerBlock.mainTitle: Start saving 80% of your time and budget today!
